ANT script I tried to run
I believe this is related to the default target being in an included sub-file.

Thanks for the bug report Ben.
Can you always please provide the build id number in your bug reports...thanks.

I am pretty sure that this is a duplicate of bug 78198 and bug 78141 if you 
are running on a build older than I20041116

Please re-open if my diagnosis is incorrect.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 78198 ***
